channel.title: Is it possible to burn gamecube games?
channel.description: Is it possible to burn gamecube games?

item.title: Is it possible to burn gamecube games?
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

yea you can burn them. throw a log, some gas and the cd’s into a firplace and light it up.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to burn gamecube games?

item.title: Is it possible to burn gamecube games?
item.dc:creator: @blah_bah7 blah bah7
item.description:
@blah_bah7 wrote:

jme_009:

I would think so. Those little disks to fit in your computer, there is usually a little groove for them on your cd drive. They sell the little cd’s at the store for video camera’s usually, although at our store it was 20 dollars for 2 cd’s, which is a little exspensive. Then there is probably a matter of modding your gamecube to play the cd’s. Sony and xbox have protection against burned cd’s(although easy to bypass) so I’d imagine Nintendo does the same.

how do you do the ps2 games?

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to burn gamecube games?

item.title: Is it possible to burn gamecube games?
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

I’ve heard that GC games are read\burned opposite ways than a conventional disc.
You play them through the broadband adapter, they are basically streamed through.

Read full topic
